input: Please help me find the current exchange rate of US dollars to Japanese yen, and calculate how much yen I would get for exchanging 5000 US dollars, but there is no need to actually perform the exchange transaction at this stage.
reference:
1. Find the current exchange rate of US dollars to Japanese yen
1.1 Obtain currency pair information (Currency pair: USD/JPY)
1.2 Query the current exchange rate
1.3 Obtain the current exchange rate (Exchange rate: Current exchange rate)
2. Calculate the exchange amount
2.1 Obtain exchange amount information (Amount: 5000 US dollars)
2.2 Apply the current exchange rate for calculation
2.3 Output the calculation result (Amount of yen obtained: Calculated amount of yen)
